description: Easy to make and makes 18 large slices. Will keep for a week in an airtight container.
name: Easy Chocolate Coconut Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make icing, sift icing sugar and cocoa into a medium sized bowl. Add boiling water a tablespoon at a time and stir to combine. (You will probably need about 4-6 tbsps of water) Add extra water only if needed to make a nice icing paste. Spread the icing over the slice with a knife. If you do this while your slice is still warm it will be easier to spread. Sprinkle the remaining 4 tbsps of coconut evenly over the icing. Leave to set for about an hour and then cut up while still in the tray.

If you do this while your slice is still warm it will be easier to spread. Sprinkle the remaining 4 tbsps of coconut evenly over the icing. Leave to set for about an hour and then cut up while still in the tray.
